acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Bruno Aron in 2002. The accession number associated with this gift is 2002.021.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Bruno Aron was the head of the House Plan at the City University of New York. The House Plan was a cocurricular organization which involved CUNY students and staff in an effort to promote community involvement, socialization, and living in small groups in residential colleges.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains bulletins, correspondence, and flyers pertaining to the House Plan and social events it organized. The documents span from 1936 to 1940.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Bruno Aron was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
